name: web-component-base
description: Minimal base class for creating reactive custom elements easily

scripts.copy:meta: cp package.json ./dist && cp README.md ./dist && cp LICENSE ./dist
scripts.publish: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run copy:meta && npm run copy:source && cd ./dist && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm run publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm run publish
